name: Pesto pasta
desc: Picked up some pesto sauce from Trader Joes. It was delicious! Next time I should add some cherry tomatoes.

name: Naan and curry
desc: It was sooo good.. but so fattening. Definitely feel like I'm getting a food coma.

name: Gelato
desc: Allison came to visit today so we went to grab gelato at the local gelateria. Introduced her to my favorite vanilla/strawberry combo. Just can't believe they upped the price from $3.50 to $3.75!!

name: Pork and egg
desc: Feeling like a kid again 'cause mom cooked :)

name: Burger and fries
desc: Had burgers with Jane today. Next time don't get the onion rings.

name: Spaghetti and meatballs
desc: It was not that great. The only reason why I got is because I was in a rush

name: Chinese food
desc: I felt like eating better. That led me to eating healthy today. It was not too bad to be honest
